agents.name: Backend API Agent
responsibilities: Develop REST API controllers and routes
Implement business logic for orders, shipments, analytics
Generate OpenAPI contract for frontend
Optimize database queries and indexes
Apply authentication and authorization middleware

requiredResources.network: Local MongoDB connection, no external APIs

preconditions: Backend repo cloned with existing models

conflictResolution.mergePolicy: Merge to main at end of Day 1 after smoke tests pass
conflictResolution.retryPolicy: Exponential backoff on DB connection errors (3 retries, 2s delay)

agents.name: Frontend Integration Agent
responsibilities: Build API client infrastructure with TypeScript
Create React Query hooks for data fetching
Replace mock data with real API calls
Implement loading states and error handling
Polish UI/UX with skeletons and toasts
preconditions: OpenAPI contract available from backend agent
Mock data preserved in separate branch (rollback safety)

conflictResolution.mergePolicy: Merge to main incrementally after each page passes smoke test
conflictResolution.lockingMechanism: None (separate pages, no shared components modified)
conflictResolution.retryPolicy: Mock data fallback on API failure during development

agents.name: Data Seeding Agent
responsibilities: Generate 200+ realistic demo records
Implement idempotent seed scripts with upserts
Assign intelligent carrier distribution
Create predefined demo users and companies
Validate data integrity and referential consistency

taskQueue.blockedBy: Backend Day 1 complete (all models and APIs deployed)

outputs: 200 orders (30 pending, 60 delivered, 40 shipped, 10 cancelled, 15 RTO)

conflictResolution.strategy: Idempotent upsert operations with predefined UUIDs
conflictResolution.mergePolicy: Single commit after all seed tasks complete
conflictResolution.lockingMechanism: None (single agent owns all seed data)
conflictResolution.retryPolicy: Retry on unique constraint violation (3 retries, regenerate UUID)

agents.name: QA & Integration Agent
responsibilities: Execute integration tests for critical flows
Prepare demo script and credentials
Cross-browser testing and bug fixes
Performance validation (< 500ms API, < 2s page load)
Final sign-off and deployment readiness

requiredResources.network: Access to both frontend and backend

agents.expectedThroughput: 3 user flows tested in 1 hour, 10 bugs fixed in 1.5 hours
preconditions: All features integrated (Backend + Frontend + Seed complete)
Chrome, Safari, Firefox installed for cross-browser testing

conflictResolution.mergePolicy: Immediate merge for P0 bugs blocking demo
conflictResolution.retryPolicy: Rerun flaky tests 3 times before marking as failure

schedulingRules: Backend agent starts immediately on Day 1 at 9 AM IST
Frontend agent polls for T1.7 completion every 5 minutes (expected by 1 PM IST)
Seed agent starts only after backend Day 1 complete (phase boundary enforced)
QA agent starts only after Seed + Frontend complete (phase boundary enforced)

phaseTransitions.condition: Backend T1.7 complete AND Frontend T2.4 complete

metrics: Task completion rate (tasks completed / total tasks)
Frontend page load time (Time to Interactive)
Error rate per agent (errors / total operations)

alerts.action: Notify backend agent, trigger performance optimization task
Escalate to project lead, check dependency resolution
Pause agent, rollback to last known good state

dashboards: Grafana dashboard with task progress, API latency, error rate
Real-time log aggregation with correlation IDs (request ID)
